    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.pi4j.component.motor.StepperMotorBase

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GpioStepperMotorComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput[] pins)
      default constructor; using this constructor assumes that: (1) a pin state of HIGH is MOTOR STEP ON (2) a pin state of LOW is MOTOR STEP OFF
      GpioStepperMotorComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput[] pins, PinState onState, PinState offState)
      using this constructor requires that the consumer define the STEP ON and STEP OFF pin states

    • Constructor Detail

      • GpioStepperMotorComponent

        public GpioStepperMotorComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput[] pins,
                                 PinState onState,
                                 PinState offState)
        using this constructor requires that the consumer define the STEP ON and STEP OFF pin states
        Parameters:
        pins - GPIO digital output pins for each controller in the stepper motor
        onState - pin state to set when MOTOR STEP is ON
        offState - pin state to set when MOTOR STEP is OFF

      • GpioStepperMotorComponent

        public GpioStepperMotorComponent(GpioPinDigitalOutput[] pins)
        default constructor; using this constructor assumes that: (1) a pin state of HIGH is MOTOR STEP ON (2) a pin state of LOW is MOTOR STEP OFF
        Parameters:
        pins - GPIO digital output pins for each controller in the stepper motor
